conversion.description: Moved parameters out of control file into parameter file
Changed 'Module = Met' to 'Module = Input(Met) in control file
Moved 'summaryfile' parameter to the new SummaryFile module
Moved 'debug_output' parameter to the new Log module
Moved 'screen_output' parameter to the new screen module
Converted REPORT variables to new format
Converted sum@ or avg@ variables to use the new TRACKER module
Removed the default 'on process' from all tracker variables
Changed clock.today.dd/mm/yyyy report variables to just clock.dd/mm/yyyy
Added clock.ini to the module = clock line in the control file
Removed period '.' characters from report and tracker variables
Reworked the tracker variables to use the new syntax
Renamed Residue2 to SurfaceOM in all con and par files
Changed Operatns command 'residue2 tillage' to 'surfaceom tillage'
Changed Operatns command 'residue2 reset' to 'surfaceom reset'
Changed Operatns command 'residue2 add_residue' to 'surfaceom add_surfaceom'
Changed Manager 'residue2 sum_report' call to 'surfaceom sum_report'
Changed Manager 'residue2 reset' call to 'surfaceom reset'
Changed Manager 'residue2 tillage' call to 'surfaceom tillage'
Set new Manager 'add_manure' argument called 'mass' equal to 'wt'
Set new Manager 'add_manure' argument called 'cnr' equal to 'pcnt_c'/'pcnt_n'
Set new Manager 'add_manure' argument called 'cpr' equal to 'pcnt_c'/'pcnt_p'
Changed Operatns command 'manure tillage' to 'surfaceom tillage'
Changed Operatns command 'manure reset' to 'surfaceom reset'
Changed Operatns command 'manure add_manure' to 'surfaceom add_surfaceom'
Changed Manager 'Manure tillage' call to 'surfaceom tillage'
Renamed Manure to SurfaceOM in all con and par files
Replaced all %apsuite .xml paths with %apsim/Model in control file
Renamed Met, SoilWat2, SoilN2 and SurfaceOM sample paths to %apsim%/Example
Renamed PigeonP to PigeonPea in all con and par files
Renamed Irrigate to Irrigation in all con and par files
Renamed Fertiliz to Fertiliser in all con and par files
Renamed Operatns to Operations in all con and par files
Renamed APSwim to SWIM2 in all con and par files
Renamed SoilWat2 to SoilWat in all con and par files
Renamed SoilN2 to SoilN in all con and par files
Renamed SoilT to SurfaceTemp in all con and par files
